Body:
I want to include the ibmiot" Input node into my local installation of Node-RED ?

Can I do it ? and if so - how ?

The Node-RED flow editor that shows up when I start the Bluemix IoT Starter
column9:
shows the node that exactly - fits into what I want to do.

It has the API Keys
column11:
ID and so on as seen below. I'm trying to add this to my local install of Node-RED.

Any help is appreciated.

Below - I want to add the same node ( or import ) into my Laptop where I have the Node-RED installed.

"

Body:
The iotapp nodes are provided by the node-red-contrib-scx-ibmiotapp module - http://flows.nodered.org/node/node-red-contrib-scx-ibmiotapp

"
Thanks for replying - I will check it out. Your response is very much appreciated. Shashi
